review: Omg this this is soooooooo easy to use. We do not have cable and use the Internet as the only source of TV and this works well for our needs. Pretty much plug and play
author: Elizabeth

review: The Fire TV Stick exceeded my expectations in every respect.  It is quick to install, easy to use, performs flawlessly and has all of my favorite apps already on it.  Most impressive, it is fast.  I have experienced little, if any, buffering while using it.  What a time-saver that is!
author: CMG1960

review: Quick response time and upgradable.  Works much better than my smart dvr.
author: Kahoo5

review: Bought the device and it works as advertised...but so do Chromecast, Roku, Apple TV and others. What I find EXTREMELY irritating is that you are FORCED to watch a 5 minute "dummies-level" video about the product! No way to skip past or opt-out. Not cool, and negatively colors my attitude about the product before I even get a chance to use it.
author: E. Daniel Polanek

review: I.. bought the Fire TV stick to access Netflix from my HDTV. I use an HD DVD player for that now. The resolution of the Fire TV stick was worse than my HD DVD. The games on the Fire TV stick are not good.
author: Rick Panesi

review: Fire Stick TV works nicely except when it freezes, and then I have to start all over with my download.  That's the only frustration.  I like that I can see all the sports that are available and up to date Wall Street Journal.
author: Thomas R Hemphill

review: I wasn't sure what to expect with such a low profile device, but am very pleased with the Fire Stick. It was a very simple setup with a good tutorial.
author: Mark Galaydick
